title: LF Diamond ADC main to DUO to Master
body:
Hello 

I am D5 right now and i am Support/ADC main and i'm looking on just being Support main so wanting ADC duo to climb the ladder with.

replies.body: im d5 i might be interested this is my smurf im a challenger main been playing adc alot on this acc might be interested i have a duo partner atm im helping boost to master/chall but he isnt always on hit me up
Hola is plat 2 adc main too low? Deceptivesmurf and The koreansenpai are my igns
